name: Space Donut (FallenAngelsGames)
description:
New version of my first game. Now includes 2 more levels, sound effects and buff mechanic with 15 buffs!

Controls:
A/Left arrow-Move palette to the left
D/Right arrow-Move palette to the right

Cheat/devtools:
Q-Activate laser guns
B-Activate Barrier
N-Add Ball
C-Smaller palette
V-Bigger palette
